### 5 Reasons Why Custom Print Merch is Great for Events

#### Introduction
Whether it’s a pop-up, trade show, or community festival, events offer Shopify stores a unique chance to connect with customers face-to-face. Custom print merch—like t-shirts, mugs, and tote bags—makes your brand memorable long after the event ends. Here are five reasons to invest in event merch.

---

#### 1. Instant Brand Recognition
Branded merch turns attendees into walking billboards for your Shopify store.

#### 2. Builds Community and Loyalty
Giveaways and exclusive merch create excitement and a sense of belonging.

#### 3. Drives Social Sharing
Attendees love to share photos of cool swag, spreading your brand online.

#### 4. Generates Extra Revenue
Sell merch at events for an additional income stream.

#### 5. Lasting Impressions
Quality merch is kept and used, keeping your brand top-of-mind.
